feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.88.0
entry.content:
• ✨ Improved performance loading the posts list in admin (#20618) - Steve Larson
  • 🎨 Updated Source to v1.3.2 - Ghost CI
  • 🎨 Added staff notification when a sub is canceled due to failed payments (#20534) - Sag
  • 🐛 Fixed admin crashing when deleting a tier benefit that was last moved (#20628) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed publishing issue when site has no active newsletters (#20627) - Princi Vershwal
  • 🐛 Fixed member subscription details in Admin (#20619) - Sag

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.87.3...v5.88.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.88.1
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed listing pages in Admin (#20633) - Kevin Ansfield

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.88.0...v5.88.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.88.2
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed error in translate helper when invalid parameters are passed (#20663) - Sag
  • 🐛 Fixed broken link to subscription settings (#20651) - Ronald Langeveld

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.88.1...v5.88.2

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.88.3
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.88.2...v5.88.3

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.89.0
entry.content:
• ✨ Improved performance loading posts & pages in admin (#20646) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed YouTube live embeds failing in some situations - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed dark mode for standalone html editors in Admin X (#20689) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed no redirect on Portal signin when trying to access newsletters (#20683) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Disabled bulk deletion when multiple member filters are applied (#20681) - Sag
  • 🐛 Fixed spurious errors when loading modal before provider - Daniel Lockyer

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.88.3...v5.89.0
